hanzi-su-wiki:
緩

Значения

Свободный, неплотный; распускаться, ослабевать; тихий, медленный, мягкий, спокойный

Мнемоника

Свободные, ещё не закреплённые нити 糸 готовой ткани. Справа — элемент «равновесие».

Варианты

缓
purpleculture_pinyin:
huǎn
slow; unhurried; sluggish; gradual; not tense; relaxed; to postpone; to defer; to stall; to stave off; to revive; to recuperate
медленный; неторопливый; вялый; постепенный; не напряженный; расслабленный; отложить; отложить; заглохнуть; чтобы предотвратить; возродить; восстанавливать силы
rtega_mnemonic:
緩緩RS
缓缓		slow, leisurely, postpone, delay, loosen
  • leading 爰 string 糸 in the right position (weaving) is slow work
  • hands 爰 loosening the string 糸
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 缓)
Synonym: 慢
Antonyms: 急
Pictophonetic: 爰 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
緩解 [ huǎn jiě ]: to bring relief; to alleviate (a crisis); to dull (a pain)
緩慢 [ huǎn màn ]: slow; slow-moving
緩緩 [ huǎn huǎn ]: slowly; unhurriedly; little by little
緩和 [ huǎn hé ]: to ease (tension); to alleviate; to moderate; to allay; to make more mild
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 爰 [ yuán ] to lead on to; then, therefore, as a consequence
heisig_chinese_memo: Oh no Spiderman has some migrating ducks stuck in his web and he's unaware and unhurried, but he has to slacken it so they can get out.
heisig_constituent: slacken, thread, spiderman, migrating ducks, claw, vulture, one, friend
Keyword_KANJIDIC: slacken, loosen, relax, lessen, be moderate, ease
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Отпустить, ослабить, расслабиться, уменьшить, быть умеренным, легкость
koohiiStory1: [slacken; loosen; relax; lessen; be moderate; ease] The thread in this story is a cable line, something like a power or phone line. The thread was tense with all the migrating ducks perched on it, but got back to being slackened when the entire flock flew away. (darg_sama-modified,2-11-2005).
koohiiStory2: Spiderman is a slacken off. He lays around all day in the park watching migrating ducks...　RTK2:　カン　緩和　かんわ(mitigation).
kunYomi: ゆる.い、ゆる.やか、ゆる.む、ゆる.める
jp_example_words:
緩和(かんわ): relief, mitigation
緩む(ゆるむ): to become loose, to slacken
緩める(ゆるめる): to loosen, to slow down
緩やか(ゆるやか): lenient
緩い(ゆるい): loose, lenient, slow
jp_readingExamples: 緩い (ゆる.い), 緩む (ゆる.む), 緩める (ゆる.める), 緩やか (ゆる.やか)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The thread on this football is loose. We need to tighten up the loose thread on this football or it’s gonna fall apart while we’re playing.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at this football. The thread is loose on the football and needs to be tightened. Attempt to tighten the loose thread on the football as you hold it in your hands.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You finally tighten the loose thread and all of your friends cheer, “You rule!” (ゆる) You rule because you fixed the loose thread on the football and now you can play again. Yeah! You rule, man!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Listen to your friends shouting “You rule!” and hear their cheers echo in your ears as you toss the football around again.
Ru_Meaning: slacken, loosen, relax, lessen, be moderate, ease
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ノ, 又 (опять), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 爪 (ноготь), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese: huǎn: (прил/глаг) медленный, неторопливый; расслабленный; откладывать, отсрочивать; приходить в себя
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you claw your one friend's (爰) thread (糸) loose
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spidey felt sorry for the migrating ducks in his neighborhood so he built them a cozy duck house and making them the most unhurried ducks of the season.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸", "爰" sound. "Shuowen" thinks that " relief " is the province of " 𦅻 ". In the Warring States period, there are many words " slow ", but " 𦅻 " is not seen. The original meaning is loose and soothing. "Shuowen": "Slow, sleepy. From the plain, the sound. Slow, 𦅻 or province." Such as "Nineteen Ancient Poems." Going and re-going": "The day is far away, and the day of clothing has been slowed down." "Huainanzi. General Discussion: "At this time, Mingtang Taimiao, hanging the crown and unwinding the sword, went to bed slowly."

" Relaxation " means lenient (of a government order or penalty). Such as "Pipe. "Five Elements": "Benefit the words, lenient death, and probate the offender." "Han Feizi. Difficulty Two": "Today's suspension of punishment and acts of lenient benefit will benefit the evil and harm the good. This is not the reason for the treatment."

" Slow " means slow, as opposed to " urgent ". Such as "Tsinghua Lu. "Guan Zhong" Jian 27: "However, it is either 𢼊 (relaxation) or Zhang, or slow or [糸 urgent] (urgent)." "Xunzi. King Domination: "It’s nothing but eager for the monarchs and the people to rush for pleasure and slow the governance of the country!"

" Slow " also means delay and delay. Such as "Mencius. "Teng Wen Gong 1": "Civil Civil Affairs cannot be delayed." "Historical Records. "The Biography of Tian Dan": "The Qi people are not attached, so let's attack Jimo slowly and wait for it."

" Slow " can mean negligence. Such as "Mozi. "Family": "Slow the wise and forget the scholars, and there have never been those who can survive in their country."

" Slow " also means softness. "Lu's Spring and Autumn. Ren Di": "People must use drought to make the soil fertile and slow the soil." Gao Luu's note: "Slow, soft."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸", "爰" sound. The original meaning is loose and soothing.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「爰」聲。《說文》以為「緩」是「𦅻」的省體。戰國文字多見「緩」，未見「𦅻」。本義是寬鬆、舒緩。《說文》：「緩，繛也。从素，爰聲。緩，𦅻或省。」如《古詩十九首．行行重行行》：「相去日已遠，衣帶日已緩。」《淮南子．氾論》：「當此之時，明堂太廟，懸冠解劍，緩帶而寢。」

　　「緩」引申表示（政令或刑罰的）寬弘。如《管子．五行》：「大揚惠言，寬刑死，緩罪人。」《韓非子．難二》：「今緩刑罰，行寬惠，是利姦邪而害善人也，此非所以為治也。」

　　「緩」表示慢，與「急」相對。如《清華陸．管仲》簡27：「然則或𢼊（弛）或張，或緩或[糸亟]（急）。」《荀子．王霸》：「今君人者急逐樂而緩治國，豈不過甚矣哉！」

　　「緩」又表示延遲、延緩。如《孟子．滕文公上》：「民事不可緩也。」《史記．田單列傳》：「齊人未附，故且緩攻即墨以待其事。」

　　「緩」可表示怠慢。如《墨子．親士》：「緩賢忘士，而能以其國存者，未曾有也。」

　　「緩」還表示柔軟。《呂氏春秋．任地》：「人耨必以旱，使地肥而土緩。」高誘注：「緩，柔也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「爰」聲。本義是寬鬆、舒緩。

①慢，與“急”相對：緩步。緩行(xíng)。緩慢。遲緩。
②延遲：緩刑。緩辦。緩役。緩徵。刻不容緩。
③放鬆，鬆弛：緩和。緩衝。緩解。和緩。
④甦醒，恢復：緩氣。緩醒。
⑤慢徐疾急。[合]緩帶(放寬衣帶。從容自在的樣子)；緩服(寬鬆的服裝。對戎裝而言)；緩帶輕裘(寬鬆的衣帶，輕暖的皮衣。形容從容儒雅的風度。)

從「 糸 」，「 爰 」聲。《說文》以為「 緩 」是「 𦅻 」的省體。戰國文字多見「 緩 」，未見「 𦅻 」。本義是寬鬆、舒緩。《說文》：「緩，繛也。从素，爰聲。緩，𦅻或省。」如《古詩十九首．行行重行行》：「相去日已遠，衣帶日已緩。」《淮南子．氾論》：「當此之時，明堂太廟，懸冠解劍，緩帶而寢。」 「 緩 」引申表示（政令或刑罰的）寬弘。如《管子．五行》：「大揚惠言，寬刑死，緩罪人。」《韓非子．難二》：「今緩刑罰，行寬惠，是利姦邪而害善人也，此非所以為治也。」 「 緩 」表示慢，與「 急 」相對。如《清華陸．管仲》簡27：「然則或𢼊（弛）或張，或緩或[糸亟]（急）。」《荀子．王霸》：「今君人者急逐樂而緩治國，豈不過甚矣哉！」 「 緩 」又表示延遲、延緩。如《孟子．滕文公上》：「民事不可緩也。」《史記．田單列傳》：「齊人未附，故且緩攻即墨以待其事。」 「 緩 」可表示怠慢。如《墨子．親士》：「緩賢忘士，而能以其國存者，未曾有也。」 「 緩 」還表示柔軟。《呂氏春秋．任地》：「人耨必以旱，使地肥而土緩。」高誘注：「緩，柔也。」
From " 糸", " 爰" sound. "Shuowen" thinks that " relief" is the province of " 𦅻". In the Warring States period, there are many words " slow", but " 𦅻" is not seen. The original meaning is loose and soothing. "Shuowen": "Slow, sleepy. From the plain, the sound. Slow, 𦅻 or province." Such as "Nineteen Ancient Poems." Going and re-going": "The day is far away, and the day of clothing has been slowed down." "Huainanzi. General Discussion: "At this time, Mingtang Taimiao, hanging the crown and unwinding the sword, went to bed slowly." " Relaxation" means lenient (of a government order or penalty). Such as "Pipe. "Five Elements": "Benefit the words, lenient death, and probate the offender." "Han Feizi. Difficulty Two": "Today's suspension of punishment and acts of lenient benefit will benefit the evil and harm the good. This is not the reason for the treatment." " Slow" means slow, as opposed to " urgent". Such as "Tsinghua Lu. "Guan Zhong" Jian 27: "However, it is either 𢼊 (relaxation) or Zhang, or slow or [糸 urgent] (urgent)." "Xunzi. King Domination: "It’s nothing but eager for the monarchs and the people to rush for pleasure and slow the governance of the country!" " Slow" also means delay and delay. Such as "Mencius. "Teng Wen Gong 1": "Civil Civil Affairs cannot be delayed." "Historical Records. "The Biography of Tian Dan": "The Qi people are not attached, so let's attack Jimo slowly and wait for it." " Slow" can mean negligence. Such as "Mozi. "Family": "Slow the wise and forget the scholars, and there have never been those who can survive in their country." " Slow" also means softness. "Lu's Spring and Autumn. Ren Di": "People must use drought to make the soil fertile and slow the soil." Gao Luu's note: "Slow, soft."

緩字的基本解释

緩
huǎn
见“缓”。

緩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huǎn］
［《廣韻》胡管切，上緩，匣。］
“缓1”的繁体字。
(1)宽绰；宽松。
(2)谓刑政等宽弘、宽恕。
(3)迟；慢。
(4)推迟；延缓。
(5)怠慢。
(6)柔软；疏松。
(7)软弱；柔弱。
(8)中医亦特指脉搏弛缓无力的病症。
(9)谓朝纲弛弱不振。
(10)恢复，恢复正常状态。
(11)姓。见《魏书·官氏志》。

緩字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緩； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页931第12
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【正韻】胡管切【集韻】戸管切【韻會】合管切，?音浣。【說文】?，或省作緩。綽也。【玉篇】遲緩也。【廣韻】舒也。【釋名】緩，浣也，斷也。持之不急則動搖，浣斷自放縱也。【禮·樂記】其樂心感者，其聲嘽以緩。【疏】歡樂在心，故聲必隨而寬緩。【孟子】民事不可緩也。【疏】惟民事當急，而不可緩也。【前漢·朱博傳】齊部舒緩養名。【註】師古曰：其性遲緩，多自高大以養名聲。　又【集韻】火遠切，音咺。苦緩切，音款。義?同。

緩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
緩字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huǎn］
["Guangyun" Huguan cut, slow up, box. ]
The traditional characters of "iller 1".
(1) Generous; loose.
(2) It is called forgiveness and forgiveness such as criminal administration.
(3) Late; slow.
(4) Postpone; postpone.
(5) Neglect.
(6) Soft; loose.
(7) Weakness; weakness.
(8) Traditional Chinese medicine also specifically refers to the symptoms of weak pulse.
(9) Said that the Chao Gang was weak and weak.
(10) Recovery, return to normal state.
(11) Last name. See "Wei Shu·Guan Shi Zhi".

[Release name] Slow, Huan Ye, Shu Ye. If you don't be anxious, you will waver, and you will indulge yourself. 【Li·Le Ji】For those who feel happy, their voice will be slowed down. 【Sparse】Happiness is in the heart, so the voice will be relaxed. [Mencius] Civil affairs cannot be delayed. 【Sparse】Only civil affairs should be urgent, not delayed. [Previous Han · Zhu Bo Biography] Qibu soothing and raising the name. huǎn
вм. 缓
Radicals: 糸, 爰  (thread, football)
Meaning Mnemonic
The thread on this football is loose. We need to tighten up the loose thread on this football or it’s gonna fall apart while we’re playing.
Look at this football. The thread is loose on the football and needs to be tightened. Attempt to tighten the loose thread on the football as you hold it in your hands.
Reading Mnemonic
You finally tighten the loose thread and all of your friends cheer, “You rule!” (ゆる) You rule because you fixed the loose thread on the football and now you can play again. Yeah! You rule, man!
Listen to your friends shouting “You rule!” and hear their cheers echo in your ears as you toss the football around again.
